title: Paintings
summaries: Paintings are decorative furniture items that can be placed on background walls. Each one is a framed image that depicts a particular scene, usually Terraria-related. Their tooltips generally contain a person's name, apparently intended to credit each painting's artist; although the names appear to be fictional, most of them correspond to known Terraria developers, artists, testing staff, and community members (see Trivia below). (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Paintings are highlighted by the Spelunker Potion, Magic Lantern, Spelunker Glowsticks, and Spelunker Flares.

There are currently 173 paintings, 24 of which are sold by the Painter, 7 by the Princess(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), 4 by the Golfer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), 1 by the Zoologist, 1 by the Clothier, 1 by the Truffle, and 22 are randomly sold by the Traveling Merchant. 32 paintings are found placed naturally in Underground Cabins, another 14 in the Underground Desert (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), 25 in the Dungeon, 12 in The Underworld, 6 from Floating Islands, 2 obtained by fishing, 1 from the Jungle Temple, 5 randomly acquired from Goodie Bags, 8 dropped by Solar Eclipse enemies, and 8 awarded randomly by the Angler for completing fishing quests.
